title: Patch Notes
content: the short-sleeved Sorcerer Robe. Fixed Brynna's clothes clipping through her arm and revealing her armpit. She informed us she was not, in fact, begging for a tickle. Fixed a gap between Lump's big ol' neck and his armour. Fixed Astarion's Padded Armour sometimes clipping through his bum. Fixed visible neck seams on Body Type 1 gnomes when wearing the Teal Slimfit Outfit. Fixed Estra Stir's collar clipping into her neck. Fixed the Protecty Sparkswall clothing clipping into female shoulders. Fix
